list_definition.definition: a stage in the Earth’s development, an artist’s development, in history etc
the punctuation mark (.), put at the end of a sentence; a full stop.
(of furniture, costumes etc) of or from the same or appropriate time in history; antique or very old

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His house is full of period furniture (=antique furniture).
